headline: Building Information Market to Soar from $9.03B in 2025 to $15.42B by 2030, Driven by Digital Transformation
summary: The global building information modeling (BIM) market is set to surge from USD 9.03 billion in 2025 to USD 15.42 billion by 2030, growing at a CAGR of 11.3%. This growth is propelled by BIM's role in enhancing planning, cost control, and risk management in construction. Government mandates and tech integration with IoT, AI, and digital twins further bolster its adoption. The pre-construction phase will dominate the market, leveraging BIM for design visualization and cost estimation. Cloud deploy

headline: 3 Large-Cap Stocks That Fall Short
summary: Large-cap stocks have the power to shape entire industries thanks to their size and widespread influence. With such vast footprints, however, finding new areas for growth is much harder than for smaller, more agile players.
